metadata.title: LetterCraft - AI Cover Letter Generator

questionnaire.title: Personalized questionnaire
questionnaire.subtitle: Answer a few questions to personalize your letter

question1.title: Why are you particularly interested in this position?
question1.placeholder: Describe your motivation for this position and company. Show your knowledge of the company and explain why you want to work there...

question2.title: Which experience from your CV would you like to highlight?

question3.title: Which skills best match the job requirements?

question4.title: How do your values align with those of the company?
question4.placeholder: Explain how your personal and professional values correspond to the company culture...

question5.title: Are there any specific elements you would like to mention?
question5.placeholder: Personal projects, additional training, particular experiences that strengthen your application...

question6.title: In which language would you like to generate your cover letter?
question6.placeholder: Select the language for your letter

validation.selectSkills: Please select at least one skill

flow.analyzeJobDesc: Analyze the job offer to extract key information

auth.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please log in again.

deletion.checkEmail: Check your email to confirm the deletion
deletion.urgentMessage: Your account will be deleted very soon. Click "Cancel deletion" if you change your mind.
deletion.title: Account Deletion
deletion.subtitle: This action is irreversible. All your data will be deleted.
deletion.warningIntro: Deleting your account will result in:

warningList.profile: Deletion of your profile and personal information
warningList.cvs: Deletion of all your uploaded CVs
warningList.letters: Deletion of all your generated and saved letters
warningList.subscription: Immediate cancellation of your subscription (no refund)

deletion.gdprDescription: We respect your right to erasure under Article 17 of GDPR.
deletion.gdprInvoices: Only your invoices will be kept anonymized for 7 years for legal accounting obligations.
deletion.gracePeriodDescription: After email confirmation, you have 48 hours to cancel the deletion.
deletion.gracePeriodWarning: After this period, the deletion will be final and irreversible.
deletion.hardDeleteDescription: All your data is permanently deleted
deletion.softDeleteDescription: Your data is anonymized but kept for statistics
deletion.reasonPlaceholder: Help us improve our service by telling us why you're leaving...
deletion.emailConfirmationDescription: A confirmation link will be sent to your email address
deletion.acknowledgeDescription: I understand that this action is irreversible and all my data will be deleted
deletion.acknowledgeRequired: Please confirm that you understand the consequences
deletion.requestDescription: Your account deletion request has been successfully registered.
deletion.emailSentDescription: Check your email and click on the confirmation link to validate the deletion.
deletion.scheduledDescription: Your account will be deleted on {date}
deletion.canCancelDescription: You can cancel this request anytime before this date from your profile.
